_header: Fleshly lusts and feasts / And furs of diverse manner of beasts

Bod123.First Lines:
fflesly lustes & festesAnd fururers of dyuerse
                    bestes…
Bod123.Last Lines:
…And women with thayre hye hedysHaue almost lost thys
                    londe

OxfCCC274.First Lines:
Fleshly lustys and festysAnd furres of divers manner of
                    bestys…
